segments.text: I am looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is slightly turned, but her focus is clearly on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running, and water is just pouring out of the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly overflowing, creating a continuous sheet over the cabinet front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is spreading across the floor right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What truly amazes me is that she has one foot directly in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such a chaotic situation unfolding?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely surprised by her placid expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little fearful about what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be extensive, I am sure.
segments.speaker: PAR
